#summary A junit runner for GAE/j production server.

=What Is KotoriWebJUnitRunner(ktrwjr)?=
KotoriWebJUnitRunner(ktrwjr) is a junit runner for GAE/j,
which helps to run your tests on the Production Server and the Development Server.

http://img.f.hatena.ne.jp/images/fotolife/b/bufferings/20100509/20100509012557.jpg



=Demonstration=
http://ktrwjr.appspot.com/

=Features=
 * Supports both Java6 and Java5
 * Supports both jUnit4 and jUnit3
 * Supports HOT Reloading of Slim3
 * Created with GWT
 * Designed with jQueryUI Theme
